There are so many interesting tops to wear with skirts youll probably never run out of options, experimentation is the key!
Long skirts with tops are a combination that suits pretty much any body type, as long as you have the right tops to wear with long skirts!
One of the best day looks is pairing a plain white top with stylish long skirts. By stylish I mean your style! Floral, printed, striped... whatever you like.

Slim pants are arguably the most flattering you can wear no matter your size, if you decide to use pants that is.
If you wear pants, remember they should hit near the top of your ankle. Theres a thin line of looking fashionable rather than like youre wading through a puddle.

Here is a tip for men wearing pants: There is a line between fits well and fits too tight. You should be able to tell by simply looking in the mirror: You shouldnt see the outline of your quad muscles.

Skater skirts, also known as circle skirts, flare out away from the body in a flattering, girly way. Theyre usually worn around the waist, which makes them shorter, but also versatile.
Bodycon mini skirts are very form-fitting and are often made of a thin fabric. Don't be afraid to use them when youre wanting to embrace a sexy style.
Denim minis are really easy to pair with clothing and accessories. Just be sure to pick a top based on the fit of the skirt.
Mini skirts with layers have soft folds that give off an elegant vibe. These are perfect for work or for brunch at a fancy restaurant with your girlfriends.
If youre wanting to stand out, pick a skirt with some ruffles that has an interesting cut. An outfit with a fun piece like this can be trendy, feminine, and quirky all at the same time!
